tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following subatomic particles will NOT be noticeably deflected when traveling perpendicular to an external magnetic field?
bonus_question: -   –  The plunger of a water-filled hypodermic syringe is pushed in at a constant speed of 1 millimeter per second. If the diameter of the syringe’s needle is one tenth that of the barrel, how fast, in millimeters per second, does water shoot out of the needle?
